TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerNameRegistration extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerNameRegistration Implements IDisposable, ISerializable
type PeerNameRegistration = class interface IDisposable interface ISerializable

summary.span: 在一个 或一组群中注册 。

span.span: Registers a in a or set of clouds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册创建 （或更新） 与相关联的所有信息在对等群或云中。Registration creates (or updates) all the information that is associated with a in a peer cloud or clouds. 可以有多个相同对等名称的对象。It is possible to have multiple objects for the same peer name. 在这种情况下，如果安全的对等名称，每个实例表示中另一个云。In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance represents in a different cloud. 但是，如果不安全的对等名称，则可以注册在同一云中多次，提供每个注册从不同的进程。However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times, providing that each registration is from a different process.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回类型的新默认实例。Returns a new default instance of type . 它不会在构造期间执行对等名称注册。It does not perform peer name registration during construction. 实例化后使用此构造函数的对象，调用方应填充的相应字段中的实例之前调用或。After instantiating an object with this constructor, the caller should populate the appropriate fields in the instance prior to calling or .

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和端口号初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and port number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数创建一个实例，它将用于注册所有源地址 (包括 ipv6 和 IPv4) 和对等方当前参与的所有云提供的端口。Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6and IPv4) and the provided port for all clouds in which the peer is currently participating. 如果成功，构造该对象指定和进行填充。If the object is constructed successfully, the specified and are populated. 如果对等名称保护和以前中注册对等方当前参与，引发。If the peer name is secured and was previously registered in a the peer is currently participating in, an is thrown. 此构造函数仅创建实例; 它不执行注册。This constructor only creates a instance; it does not perform the registration. 后实例化具有此构造函数的注册对象并填充其字段，该应用程序必须调用以执行实际的注册。After instantiating the registration object with this constructor and populating its fields, the application must call to perform the actual registration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此构造函数创建一个实例，它将用于注册所有源地址 （IPv6 和 IPv4）、 提供的端口和指定。Calling this constructor creates an instance that will be used to register all source addresses (both IPv6 and IPv4), the provided port, and the specified . 如果成功构造对象时，填充其属性与指定，和。If the object is constructed successfully, the properties are populated with the specified , and . 如果云参数是`null`，使用注册名称快捷方式，为默认值初始化， ，和。If the cloud parameter is `null`, the name is registered using the shortcut, which initializes default values for the , , and . 实例化之后,必须在调用方法来注册。After instantiation, the method must be called to register the .

summary.span: 释放由 对象使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对等方离开，不再需要在云中与对等方关联的对象。When a peer leaves a , the cloud no longer requires the object associated with the peer. 注册对象是否已停止或已释放是依赖于是否在云中将重复使用要注册此对等方或另一个对等的对象。Whether the registration object is stopped or disposed is dependent upon whether the cloud will reuse the object to register this peer or another peer. 如果在对等主机进行通信应注册对象中的任何其他终结点，请注册云内的这些终结点必须出现在停止或释放此对象之前。If there are any other endpoint(s) within the registration object with which the peer host expected to communicate, registering those endpoints within the cloud must occur before stopping or disposing of this object. 如果在云中期望注册多个对等的则建议采用方法; 当在云中不再需要内存时，它应返回到操作系统通过方法。If the cloud expects to register more peers, the method is recommended; when the cloud no longer needs the memory, it should be returned to the operating system via the method.

summary.span: 获取为其注册关联对等名称的网络终结点的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

value.span: 一个 对象，其中包含为其注册关联对等名称的网络终结点。

span.span: An object that contains the network endpoints for which the associated peer name is registered.

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中命名空间，网络终结点表示为一个 IP 地址和端口号。In the namespace, an represents a network endpoint as an IP address and a port number. 有关 PNRP，必须为每个终结点提供的 IP 地址和端口值。For PNRP, an IP address and port value must be provided for each endpoint. 可以提供的终结点的最大数目为 10。The maximum number of endpoints that can be provided is ten. 当此参数为使用自动地址选择`null`。Automatic address selection is used when this parameter is `null`. 如果使用的注册方法会自动选择要注册的地址，没有方法确定要为其注册的对等名称。If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine theaddresses for which the peer name was registered. 也就是说，属性不会更新以反映所选择的地址。That is, the property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected. 当对等名称注册为多个节点，每个不同和每个注册实例上定义的属性将为不同。When a peer name is registered for more than one node, each is distinct and the property defined on each registration instance will be different. 此外，当将注册到多个，每个注册是不同的终结点集合通常都是不同的每个实例。Also, when a is registered into more than one , each registration is distinct and the collection of endpoints will usually be different for each instance.

span.para: 此对等方将与其通信的终结点的列表不是以不同的方式存储终结点来识别此对等名称，列表相同。
The list of endpoints with which this peer will communicate is not the same as the list of endpoints by which this peer name is known, which is stored differently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可针对多个节点; 注册的对等名称每个实例是不同。A peer name can be registered for more than one node; each instance is distinct. 属性与每个相应关联实例是不同。The property associated with each corresponding instance is different. 此外，就可以注册多个节点都连接到; 的云的对等名称每个这些注册与不同。Also, it is possible to register a peer name for more than one cloud that the node is connected to; each of these registrations is distinct. 对等名称在每个实例会有所不同。The peer name's will be different in each of these instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该方法注册中指定的对等名称属性和所有源地址和构造函数中指定。The method registers the peer name specified in the property with all source addresses and the specified in the constructor. 仅当未不指定任何终结点时，此方法使用默认端口。The default port is used by this method only when no endpoints are specified. 如果属性是`null`，此方法注册中指定的对等名称属性使用字段中，这将初始化为默认值， ，以及.If the property is `null`, this method registers the peer name specified in the property using the field, which initializes default values for the , , and . 之后启动对象后，方法用于将其停止。After a object has been started, the method is used to stop it. 若要更新注册，必须使用方法。To update a registration, the method must be used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并将其注册以及指定的元数据。The following code example creates a and registers it along with the metadata specified. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPRegisterPeerName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPRegisterPeerName/CS/RegisterPeerName.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 从对等名称注册的所有云中注销 属性中指定的对等名称。

span.span: Unregisters the peer name specified in the property from all the clouds in which it was registered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册过程已停止后，正在构造的默认构造函数后直接注册对象的状态是等于的状态。After the registration process has been stopped, the registration object's state is equal to the state directly after being constructed by the default constructor. 在此状态下，其所有属性都假定没有值。In this state, all of its properties are assumed to have no value. 方法可用于重新启动它。The method may be used to restart it. 很可能有多个为相同的对等名称的注册对象。It is possible to have multiple registration objects for the same peer name. 在这种情况下，如果安全的对等名称，每个实例将表示不同的 PNRP 群中注册。In such a case, if the peer name is secured, each instance will represent a registration in a different PNRP cloud. 但是，如果不安全的对等名称，则可以注册在同一云中多次。However, if the peer name is not secured, it can be registered in the same cloud multiple times. 如果此实例已停止，调用此方法无效。If this instance is already stopped, calling this method has no effect.

exception.span: 尚未注册 属性。

span.span: The property has not yet been registered.

exception.span: 使用空构造函数构造 对象时会出现此种情况。

span.span: The property must be populated in this instance prior to calling .

exception.span: 此对象此前让 Dispose() 对其进行调用。

span.span: This object had Dispose() called on it previously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有信息群中都注册此完全丢弃调用之前。All information registered in cloud(s) for this prior to the call is completely discarded. 新的数据不是使用现有的注册结合使用。The new data is not combined with the existing registration. 若要更新，首先需更新此实例上的属性，然后调用此方法。To update a , first update the properties on this instance and then call this method. 之后在注册时，无法更新属性。After a is registered, the property cannot be updated. 可能更新记录中的所有其他字段。All other fields in the record may be updated.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当遍历对等网格或 时是否使用自动终结点选择。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use automatic endpoint selection when traversing a peer mesh or .

value.span: 如果使用自动终结点选择，则为 ；如果使用其他某个方法来确定终结点，则为 。

span.span: if automatic endpoint selection is to be used; if some other method will be used to determine an endpoint.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用自动终结点选择时 (此属性设置为`true`) 在开始之前指定任何终结点信息，系统选择各个终结点，并将其与关联的对等名称发布到所有可用云。When auto endpoint selection is used (this property is set to `true`) with no endpoint information specified prior to the start of a , the system chooses individual endpoints and publishes them with the associated peer name into all available clouds. 如果未指定此端口，将自动选择选择零，因为。If the port is not specified, auto selection chooses zero as the . 如果设置为`false`，不执行自动选择上文所述。When set to `false`, auto selection as described above is not performed. 这使注册过程来发布对等名称以及数据 blob (所指定的属性)。This enables the registration process to publish a peer name along with a data blob (as specified by the property). 没有任何终结点与名称相关联。No endpoints are associated with the name. 如果使用的注册方法会自动选择要注册的地址，没有方法来确定哪些地址为其对象已注册。If a registration method is used that automatically selects the addresses to register, there is no method to determine what addresses for which the object was registered. 也就是说，属性不会更新以反映所选择的地址。That is, the property will not be updated to reflect the addresses selected. 启动对等名称注册后更新此属性没有任何影响。Updating this property after peer name registration has started has no effect.
